inputs.selection_motivation: The rising electricity consumption of US data centers directly increases demand on the PJM transmission system, influencing its power supply planning and reliability metrics.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the most plausible direct or adjacent influences on US Data Centers Electricity Impact, covering regional data center ecosystems, power supply dynamics, and core hardware/energy infrastructure players. They reflect both demand-side (cloud spend, data center growth) and supply-side (power infrastructure, sustainable energy) dimensions that shape electricity impact.

proposed_link.motivation: The rising electricity consumption of US data centers directly increases demand on the PJM transmission system, influencing its power supply planning and reliability metrics.
